author: Stereogum
title: Father John Misty Turned His Deleted Facebook Post Into A T-Shirt
text: Father John Misty understands how the internet works. He might not like it, but he certainly knows how to profit from it. Case in point: Devoted music news consumers may recall when Josh Tillman expressed his disdain for The Voice contestant Aaron Gibson's godawful "Hollywood Forever Cemetery Sings" cover with a quickly deleted Facebook … More »
